namespace = dg_setup
namespace = dg_conversion
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.100
	title = dg_conversion.100.t
	desc = dg_conversion.100.d
	picture = all_refugees
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = inc_dg_3
			value = 1
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_3
								value = 200
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.106
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_3
								value = 400
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.106
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_3
								value = 600
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.106
					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.106
					days = 3
				}
			}
			PREV = {
				change_variable = {
					which = inc_dg_3
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = inc_dg_3
			value = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.100.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.101
	title = dg_conversion.101.t
	desc = dg_conversion.101.d
	picture = all_refugees
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = dg_setup.001
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.101.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.102
	title = dg_conversion.102.t
	desc = dg_conversion.102.d
	picture = all_refugees
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = inc_dg_1
			value = 1
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_1
								value = 200
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.105
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_1
								value = 400
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.105
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_1
								value = 600
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.105
					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.105
					days = 3
				}
			}
			PREV = {
				change_variable = {
					which = inc_dg_1
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = inc_dg_1
			value = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.102.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.104
	title = dg_conversion.104.t
	desc = dg_conversion.104.d
	picture = all_refugees
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = inc_dg_2
			value = 1
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_2
								value = 100
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.001
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_2
								value = 200
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.001
					days = 1
					random = 2
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_2
								value = 300
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.001
					days = 3
					random = 2
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_2
								value = 400
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.001
					days = 5
					random = 2
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						PREV = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inc_dg_2
								value = 600
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.001
					days = 7
					random = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.001
					days = 9
					random = 2
				}
			}
			PREV = {
				change_variable = {
					which = inc_dg_2
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = inc_dg_2
			value = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.104.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.105
	title = dg_conversion.105.t
	desc = dg_conversion.105.d
	picture = all_refugees
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = total_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = catholic_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = orthodox_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = protestant_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = reformed_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = hussite_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = gnostic_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = chaldean_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = coptic_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = jewish_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = sunni_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = shiite_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = ibadi_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = wahhabi_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = druze_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = hinduism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = sikhism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = jain_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = zoroastrian_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = confucianism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = buddhism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = mahayana_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = vajrayana_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = inti_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = nahuatl_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = mesoamerican_religion_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = totemism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = pantheism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = tengri_pagan_reformed_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = shamanism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = animism_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = polynesian_religion_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = shinto_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = adi_dharam_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = hellenic_pagan_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = norse_pagan_reformed_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = slavic_pagan_reformed_population
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population
			value = 0
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				is_city = yes
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = jizya_population_local
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						has_country_flag = christian_jizya
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = catholic
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = catholic
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = orthodox
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = orthodox
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = gnostic
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = gnostic
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = hussite
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = hussite
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = chaldean
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = chaldean
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = coptic
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = coptic
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = reformed
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = reformed
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = protestant
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = protestant
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						has_country_flag = jewish_jizya
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = jewish
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = jewish
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						has_country_flag = dharmic_jizya
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = hinduism
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = hinduism
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = zoroastrian
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = zoroastrian
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = jain
							value = 1

					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local

					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						has_country_flag = buddhist_jizya
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = buddhism
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = buddhism
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mahayana
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = mahayana
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = vajrayana
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = vajrayana
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = confucianism
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = confucianism
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

						has_country_flag = pagan_jizya
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = animism
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = animism
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = tengri_pagan_reformed
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = tengri_pagan_reformed
					}
				}
				if = {

						check_variable = {
							which = shamanism
							value = 1

					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = shamanism
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = shinto
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = shinto
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = polynesian_religion
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = polynesian_religion
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = west_african_pagan_reformed
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = west_african_pagan_reformed
					}
				}
			}
			if = {

						has_country_flag = new_world_pagan
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = inti
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = inti
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = nahuatl
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = nahuatl
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = pantheism
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = pantheism
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = totemism
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = totemism
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mesoamerican_religion
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = mesoamerican_religion
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						has_country_flag = european_pagan_jizya
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = baltic_pagan_reformed
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = baltic_pagan_reformed
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = slavic_pagan_reformed
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = slavic_pagan_reformed
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = finnish_pagan_reformed
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = finnish_pagan_reformed
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = norse_pagan_reformed
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = norse_pagan_reformed
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = hellenic_pagan
							value = 1
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = jizya_population_local
						which = hellenic_pagan
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = catholic
						value = 20
					}
				}
				owner = {
					change_variable = {
						which = catholic_population
						value = 10
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = catholic
						value = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = {
						which = catholic
						which = PREV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = catholic
						value = 0.5
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = catholic_population
						which = catholic
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = catholic
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = orthodox
						value = 20
					}
				}
				owner = {
					change_variable = {
						which = orthodox_population
						value = 10
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = orthodox
						value = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = {
						which = orthodox
						which = PREV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = orthodox
						value = 0.5
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = orthodox_population
						which = orthodox
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = orthodox
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = protestant
						value = 20
					}
				}
				owner = {
					change_variable = {
						which = protestant_population
						value = 10
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = protestant
						value = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = {
						which = protestant
						which = PREV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = protestant
						value = 0.5
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = protestant_population
						which = protestant
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = protestant
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = reformed
						value = 20
					}
				}
				owner = {
					change_variable = {
						which = reformed_population

					which = total_population
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_variable_equal = {
						which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				divide_variable = {
					which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population
					which = total_population
				}
			}
		}

			value = 100

			limit = {

			limit = {

					AND = {

							has_dlc = "The Cossacks"
						}
						OR = {

						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = european_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					change_variable = {
						which = tolerated_population
						which = buddhist_population
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = chinese_rites_banned
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = tolerated_population
					which = christian_population
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
					has_country_flag = chinese_rites_banned
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = tolerated_population
					which = non_catholic_christian_population
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = jews_tolerated
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = tolerated_population
					which = jewish_population
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = tolerated_population
					which = dharmic_population
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = tolerated_heretic_population
						which = buddhist_population
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = tolerated_heretic_population
						which = confucianism_population
					}
				}
				else = {
					change_variable = {
						which = tolerated_population
						which = buddhist_population
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = animism
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = animism_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = west_african_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = polynesian_religion
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = polynesian_religion_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = shinto
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = shinto_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = shamanism
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = shamanism_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = tengri_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = adi_dharam
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = adi_dharam_population
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					change_variable = {
						which = tolerated_population
						which = buddhist_population
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = pantheism
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = new_world_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = pantheism_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = nahuatl
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = new_world_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = nahuatl_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = inti
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = new_world_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = inti_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = totemism
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = new_world_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = totemism_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = mesoamerican_religion
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = new_world_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = mesoamerican_religion_population
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					change_variable = {
						which = tolerated_population
						which = buddhist_population
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = hellenic_pagan
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = european_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = hellenic_pagan_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = norse_pagan_reformed
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = european_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = norse_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = european_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = slavic_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = european_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = finnish_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = european_pagan_population
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = tolerated_heretic_population
							which = baltic_pagan_reformed_population
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					change_variable = {
						which = tolerated_population
						which = buddhist_population
					}
				}
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = tolerated_population
				value = 0.5
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = tolerated_heretic_population
				value = 0.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.105.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.106
	title = dg_conversion.106.t
	desc = dg_conversion.106.d

	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = PAP
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = papal_authority
							value = 500
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_country_modifier = church_leadership_strong
							}
						}

							on_trigger = has_country_modifier
							church_leadership_strong = {
								remove_country_modifier = church_leadership_strong
							}
							church_leadership_moderate = {
								remove_country_modifier = church_leadership_moderate
							}

								remove_country_modifier = church_leadership_weak

								remove_country_modifier = church_leadership_nominal
							}
						}

							name = church_leadership_strong
							duration = -1
						}
					}

						limit = {
							NOT = {
								exists = AVI
							}
							NOT = {
								num_of_cities = 4
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_country_modifier = tithe
								}
							}

								on_trigger = has_country_modifier

									remove_country_modifier = tithe

						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_country_modifier = sede_vacante_c
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = has_country_modifier
								sede_vacante_a = {
									remove_country_modifier = sede_vacante_a
								}
								sede_vacante_b = {
									remove_country_modifier = sede_vacante_b
								}
								sede_vacante_c = {
									remove_country_modifier = sede_vacante_c
								}
							}
							add_country_modifier = {
								name = sede_vacante_c
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							PAP = {
								check_variable = {

									value = 300
								}

					limit = {
						PAP = {
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = concordat_signed
							}
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = church_council
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							exists = PAP
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PAP = {
								check_variable = {
									which = papal_authority
									value = 500
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_country_modifier = landless_pope_c
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = has_country_modifier

					}
					landless_pope_b = {
						remove_country_modifier = landless_pope_b
					}
					landless_pope_c = {
						remove_country_modifier = landless_pope_c
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							exists = PAP
						}
						PAP = {
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = concordat_signed
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = landless_pope_turned_away
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_country_modifier = exiled_pope_b
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = has_country_modifier
								exiled_pope_a = {
									remove_country_modifier = exiled_pope_a
								}
								exiled_pope_b = {
									remove_country_modifier = exiled_pope_b
								}

					remove_country_modifier = uniate_church_with_concessions
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = orthodox
					religion = coptic
				}
				AND = {
					is_subject = yes
					NOT = {
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					NOT = {
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
				overlord = {
					OR = {
						religion = orthodox
						religion = coptic
					}
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = orthodox_patriarchate
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = autonomous_church
				}
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = orthodox_patriarchate
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					overlord = {
						NOT = {
							primary_culture = ROOT
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						primary_culture = greek
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_country_modifier = foreign_liturgy
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = {
						name = foreign_liturgy
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {

							}
							AND = {
								num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
									OR = {
										has_province_modifier = madrassa
										has_province_modifier = sufi_settlement
									}
									value = 3
								}
								NOT = {
									num_of_cities = 24
								}
							}
							AND = {
								num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
									OR = {
										has_province_modifier = madrassa
										has_province_modifier = sufi_settlement
									}
									value = 4
								}
								NOT = {
									num_of_cities = 32
								}

								num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
									OR = {
										has_province_modifier = madrassa

									}
									value = 5
								}
								NOT = {
									num_of_cities = 40
								}
							}
						}

							NOT = {
								has_country_modifier = madrassas_strong

				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_modifier = hre_dominant_member
				}
				remove_country_modifier = hre_dominant_member
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_modifier = hre_dominant_observer
				}
				remove_country_modifier = hre_dominant_observer
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.106.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.001
	title = dg_conversion.001.t
	desc = dg_conversion.001.d
	picture = ai_only
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = dei_gratia
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_setup.001
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_papal_controller = yes
				}
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							exists = yes
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = catholic_state
					clr_country_flag = orthodox_state
					clr_country_flag = gnostic_state
					clr_country_flag = chaldean_state
					clr_country_flag = hussite_state
					clr_country_flag = protestant_state
					clr_country_flag = reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = coptic_state
					clr_country_flag = sunni_state
					clr_country_flag = shiite_state
					clr_country_flag = druze_state
					clr_country_flag = ibadi_state
					clr_country_flag = wahhabi_state
					clr_country_flag = confucianism_state
					clr_country_flag = shinto_state
					clr_country_flag = mahayana_state
					clr_country_flag = buddhism_state
					clr_country_flag = vajrayana_state
					clr_country_flag = hinduism_state
					clr_country_flag = jain_state
					clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_state
					clr_country_flag = sikhism_state
					clr_country_flag = jewish_state
					clr_country_flag = totemism_state
					clr_country_flag = animism_state
					clr_country_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = shamanism_state
					clr_country_flag = nahuatl_state
					clr_country_flag = mesoamerican_religion_state
					clr_country_flag = inti_state
					clr_country_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = pantheism_state
					clr_country_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_state
					clr_country_flag = hellenic_pagan_state
					clr_country_flag = adi_dharam_state
					clr_country_flag = polynesian_religion_state
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PAP = {
							has_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PAP = {
								NOT = {
									has_country_flag = crusade_called
								}
							}
						}
						PAP = {
							clr_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							any_country = {
								has_country_flag = crusade_target
							}
						}
						random_country = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic

								limit = {
									any_known_country = {

									clr_country_flag = crusade_leader_sought
								}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion_group = pagan
						religion_group = european_pagan
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = syncretism
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = syncretism
					}
					remove_province_modifier = syncretism
					change_variable = {
						which = converted_heathens
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_religion_enabled = protestant
					}
					NOT = {
						is_religion_enabled = reformed
					}
					religion = catholic
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = renaissance

					clr_province_flag = renaissance_ideas
					clr_province_flag = humanist_ideas

					clr_country_flag = pantheism_state
					set_country_flag = was_pantheism
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = totemism_state

							religion = totemism

							}

				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					is_colony = yes
					NOT = {
						has_province_flag = frontier_church
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = frontier_church
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = colonial_mission
					num_free_building_slots = 1
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							OR = {
								has_building = temple
								has_building = temple_heathen
							}
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							has_building = great_temple
						}
					}
				}
				add_building = temple
				clr_province_flag = colonial_mission
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					religion_group = owner
					is_city = yes
					OR = {
						AND = {
							religion_group = christian
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_christian
							}
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = muslim
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_muslim
							}
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = dharmic
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_dharmic
							}
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = pagan
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_pagan
							}
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = european_pagan
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_european_pagan
							}
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = new_world_pagan
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_new_world_pagan
							}
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = jewish_group
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_jewish_group
							}
						}
						AND = {
							religion_group = taoic
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = owner_taoic
							}
						}
					}
				}
				clr_province_flag = owner_christian
				clr_province_flag = owner_muslim
				clr_province_flag = owner_dharmic
				clr_province_flag = owner_pagan
				clr_province_flag = owner_new_world_pagan
				clr_province_flag = owner_jewish_group

					limit = {
						religion_group = taoic
						has_province_flag = owner_taoic
						NOT = {
							owner = {
								religion_group = taoic
							}
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = owner_taoic
					set_province_flag = buddhist_artifacts
				}

					limit = {

							religion_group = christian
						}

					set_province_flag = owner_christian

						else = {
							add_patriarch_authority = 0.55
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_patriarch_authority = 0.50

								which = church_property
								value = 9

					}
					multiply_variable = {

						value = 0.60

									}
									NOT = {

										}

								}

										}

							}

								name = hindu_pilgrimage
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner = {
								NOT = {
									has_country_flag = holy_city_of_varanasi
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									ai = no
									has_country_flag = religious_news_major
								}
							}
							province_event = {
								id = dg_hindu.043
								days = 0
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									owner = {
										ai = yes
									}
									owner = {
										NOT = {
											has_country_flag = religious_news_major
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_province_modifier = {
								name = hindu_pilgrimage
								duration = -1
							}
							set_country_flag = holy_city_of_varanasi
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										piety = 0.60
									}
								}
								owner = {
									add_prestige = 8
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										piety = 0.20
									}
								}
								owner = {
									add_prestige = 6
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										piety = -0.20
									}
								}
								owner = {
									add_prestige = 4
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										piety = -0.60
									}
								}
								owner = {
									add_prestige = 2
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						religion = hinduism
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
					}
					remove_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owner = {
								religion = catholic
							}
							NOT = {
								any_neighbor_province = {
									has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								any_neighbor_province = {
									any_neighbor_province = {
										has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
									}
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							owner = {
								religion = hinduism
							}
							NOT = {
								any_neighbor_province = {
									has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								any_neighbor_province = {
									any_neighbor_province = {
										has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
									}
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							owner = {
								religion = orthodox
							}
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = lavra
							}
						}
						AND = {
							NOT = {
								owner = {
									religion = catholic
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								owner = {
									religion = hinduism
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								owner = {
									religion = orthodox
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				remove_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_province_flag = potential_pilgrimage_route
					}
					OR = {
						has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
						has_province_modifier = hindu_pilgrimage
					}
					OR = {
						NOT = {
							any_neighbor_province = {
								has_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							any_neighbor_province = {
								any_neighbor_province = {
									has_province_modifier = pilgrimage_route
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = potential_pilgrimage_route
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = dei_gratia
				}

					limit = {

									which = urban_ratio
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = t2_P_RTV
									which = t1_P_RTV
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = t1_P_RTV
									value = 0.01
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = t3_P_RTV
									which = t1_P_RTV
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = t3_P_RTV
									value = -100
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = t3_P_RTV
									which = t2_P_RTV
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = t3_P_RTV
											value = 0.05
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = t1_P_RTV
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = urban_density
									which = t1_P_RTV
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = t1_P_RTV
									value = 0
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = t2_P_RTV
									value = 0
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = t3_P_RTV
									value = 0
								}
								divide_variable = {
									which = urban_density
									which = urban_gravity_total
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = {
											check_variable = {
												which = urban_density
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_density
										value = 0.5
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = urban_density
									value = 0
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = urban_population_removed
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = urban_percentage_removed
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = urban_base_pop_removed
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = percent_urban_transfered
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = expulsion
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_country_flag
							expulsion_catholic = {
								change_variable = {
									which = refugees_manpower
									which = catholic_refugees_manpower
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = catholic_refugees_manpower
									value = 0
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = refugees_tax
									which = catholic_refugees_tax
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = catholic_refugees_tax
									value = 0
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = refugees_production
									which = catholic_refugees_production
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = catholic_refugees_production
									value = 0
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = refugees
									which = catholic_refugees
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = catholic_refugees
									value = 0
								}

									which = inti_refugees_production
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = inti_refugees_production
									value = 0

					country_event = {
						id = dg_refugees.011
						days = 0
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = assigned_religion
							}
						}
						clr_province_flag = frontier_church
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										has_province_flag = catholic_province
										has_province_flag = protestant_province
										has_province_flag = reformed_province
										has_province_flag = orthodox_province
										has_province_flag = gnostic_province
										has_province_flag = hussite_province
										has_province_flag = coptic_province
										has_province_flag = chaldean_province
										has_province_flag = jewish_province
										has_province_flag = sunni_province
										has_province_flag = shiite_province
										has_province_flag = wahhabi_province
										has_province_flag = ibadi_province
										has_province_flag = druze_province
										has_province_flag = zoroastrian_province
										has_province_flag = adi_dharam_province
										has_province_flag = sikhism_province
										has_province_flag = jain_province
										has_province_flag = hinduism_province
										has_province_flag = confucianism_province
										has_province_flag = buddhism_province
										has_province_flag = shinto_province
										has_province_flag = mahayana_province
										has_province_flag = vajrayana_province
										has_province_flag = animism_province
										has_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_province
										has_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_province
										has_province_flag = shamanism_province
										has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_province
										has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_province
										has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_province
										has_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_province
										has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_province
										has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_province
										has_province_flag = totemism_province
										has_province_flag = inti_province
										has_province_flag = nahuatl_province
										has_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_province
										has_province_flag = pantheism_province
									}
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = religion
								catholic = {
									set_province_flag = catholic_province
									set_variable = {
										which = catholic
										value = 21
									}
								}

								}
								vajrayana = {
									set_province_flag = vajrayana_province
									set_variable = {
										which = vajrayana
										value = 21
									}
								}

							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										owner = {
											ai = yes
										}
										owner = {
											NOT = {
												has_country_flag = religious_news_major
											}
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									owner = {
										add_papal_influence = 5
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = 0.60
										}
									}
									owner = {
										add_legitimacy = 0.3
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = 0.20
										}
									}
									owner = {
										add_legitimacy = 0.3
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = -0.20
										}
									}
									owner = {
										add_legitimacy = 0.3
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = -0.60
										}
									}
									owner = {
										add_legitimacy = 0.3
									}
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											owner = {
												ai = yes
											}
											owner = {
												NOT = {
													has_country_flag = religious_news_major
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									owner = {
										change_variable = {
											which = papal_influence_conversion
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = 0.60
										}
									}
									owner = {
										change_variable = {
											which = conversion_prestige
											value = 0.5
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = 0.20
										}
									}
									owner = {
										change_variable = {
											which = conversion_prestige
											value = 0.5
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = -0.20
										}
									}
									owner = {
										change_variable = {
											which = conversion_prestige
											value = 0.5
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											piety = -0.60
										}
									}
									owner = {
										change_variable = {
											which = conversion_prestige
											value = 0.5
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								check_variable = {
									which = province_religion
									value = 1
								}
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = province_religion
										value = 0
									}
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = converts
									value = 1
								}
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = converts
										value = 0
									}
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = converted_heretics
									value = 1
								}
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = converted_heretics
										value = 0
									}
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = converted_heathens
									value = 1
								}
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = converted_heathens
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = religious_change
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
							}
						}

							set_province_flag = religious_change

								which = province_religion
								value = -4

									value = 4
								}

										}

									has_building = temple_heathen
								}
								remove_building = temple_heathen
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = temple
										}

									add_building = temple
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_conversion
							set_province_flag = religious_change

								which = converted_heathens
								value = 4

								which = converted_heretics

								limit = {
									is_capital = yes

									which = converted_heretics
									value = 4

						}

							on_trigger = has_province_flag

					if = {
						limit = {
							has_province_flag = foreign_missionary
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_modifier = missionary_obstruction
							}
							random_list = {
								60 = {
									hidden_effect = {
										set_variable = {
											which = added_unrest
											value = 1
										}
										hidden_effect = {
											province_event = {
												id = stacking_unrest.002
											}
										}
									}
									custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
								}
								40 = {
									remove_province_modifier = missionary_obstruction
									remove_province_modifier = foreign_missionary
									remove_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										has_province_modifier = foreign_missionary
										has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
									}
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = catholic_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = protestant_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = gnostic_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = hussite_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = orthodox_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = coptic_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = chaldean_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = sunni_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = shiite_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = druze_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = ibadi_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = wahhabi_missionary_active

							clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = totemism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = pantheism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = animism_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_missionary_active
							clr_province_flag = shamanism_missionary_active

							limit = {
								has_province_modifier = foreign_missionary

								chance = 10

								has_province_flag = shamanism_missionary_active
							}
							random = {
								chance = 10
								change_variable = {
									which = province_religion
									value = -2
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = shamanism
									value = 2
								}
								set_province_flag = local_heresy
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {

								value = 1
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = pantheism
								value = 11
							}

								}
							}

								}
							}
							subtract_variable = {
								which = coptic
								which = converted_heretics
							}

								which = converts
								which = converted_heretics
							}

								which = converted_heretics
								value = 0
							}

								}
							}

								which = jewish
								value = -4
							}

								which = converted_heretics
								value = -4
							}

								which = converts
								value = 4
							}

									value = 2
								}

									value = 4
								}

								check_variable = {
									which = protestant
									value = 11
								}

									which = pantheism
									which = mesoamerican_religion
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = pantheism
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = pantheism
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = pantheism
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = pantheism
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = pantheism
									which = hellenic_pagan
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = pantheism
									}
								}
								change_religion = pantheism
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									value = 2
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									which = nahuatl
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									which = mesoamerican_religion
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = inti
									which = hellenic_pagan
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = inti
									}
								}
								change_religion = inti
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
								check_variable = {
									which = nahuatl
									value = 2
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = nahuatl
									which = mesoamerican_religion
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = nahuatl
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = nahuatl
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = nahuatl
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = nahuatl
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = nahuatl
									which = hellenic_pagan
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = nahuatl
									}
								}
								change_religion = nahuatl
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
								check_variable = {
									which = mesoamerican_religion
									value = 2
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = mesoamerican_religion
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = mesoamerican_religion
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = mesoamerican_religion
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = mesoamerican_religion
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = mesoamerican_religion
									which = hellenic_pagan
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = mesoamerican_religion
									}
								}
								change_religion = mesoamerican_religion
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
								check_variable = {
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
									value = 2
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = baltic_pagan_reformed
									which = hellenic_pagan
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								change_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
								check_variable = {
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
									value = 2
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = finnish_pagan_reformed
									which = hellenic_pagan
								}

							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								change_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
								check_variable = {
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
									value = 2
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = slavic_pagan_reformed
									which = hellenic_pagan

							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								change_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change
								check_variable = {
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
									value = 2
								}
								check_variable = {
									which = norse_pagan_reformed
									which = hellenic_pagan
								}
							}
							clr_province_flag = religious_change
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = norse_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								change_religion = norse_pagan_reformed

							limit = {
								has_province_flag = religious_change

									which = hellenic_pagan
									value = 2
								}
							}

								limit = {
									NOT = {
										religion = hellenic_pagan
									}
								}
								change_religion = hellenic_pagan
							}
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = catholic_province
					clr_province_flag = orthodox_province
					clr_province_flag = protestant_province
					clr_province_flag = reformed_province
					clr_province_flag = hussite_province
					clr_province_flag = gnostic_province
					clr_province_flag = coptic_province
					clr_province_flag = chaldean_province
					clr_province_flag = jewish_province
					clr_province_flag = sunni_province
					clr_province_flag = shiite_province
					clr_province_flag = ibadi_province
					clr_province_flag = wahhabi_province
					clr_province_flag = druze_province
					clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_province
					clr_province_flag = adi_dharam_province
					clr_province_flag = sikhism_province
					clr_province_flag = jain_province
					clr_province_flag = hinduism_province
					clr_province_flag = confucianism_province
					clr_province_flag = buddhism_province
					clr_province_flag = shinto_province
					clr_province_flag = mahayana_province
					clr_province_flag = vajrayana_province
					clr_province_flag = animism_province
					clr_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_province
					clr_province_flag = shamanism_province
					clr_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_province
					clr_province_flag = polynesian_religion_province
					clr_province_flag = totemism_province
					clr_province_flag = pantheism_province
					clr_province_flag = inti_province
					clr_province_flag = nahuatl_province
					clr_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_province
					clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_province
					clr_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_province
					clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_province
					clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_province
					clr_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_province
					trigger_switch = {
						on_trigger = religion
						catholic = {
							set_province_flag = catholic_province
						}
						orthodox = {
							set_province_flag = orthodox_province
						}
						protestant = {
							set_province_flag = protestant_province
						}
						reformed = {
							set_province_flag = reformed_province
						}
						gnostic = {
							set_province_flag = gnostic_province
						}
						chaldean = {
							set_province_flag = chaldean_province
						}
						coptic = {
							set_province_flag = coptic_province
						}
						hussite = {
							set_province_flag = hussite_province
						}
						jewish = {
							set_province_flag = jewish_province
						}
						sunni = {
							set_province_flag = sunni_province
						}
						shiite = {
							set_province_flag = shiite_province
						}
						ibadi = {
							set_province_flag = ibadi_province
						}
						wahhabi = {
							set_province_flag = wahhabi_province
						}
						druze = {
							set_province_flag = druze_province
						}
						zoroastrian = {
							set_province_flag = zoroastrian_province
						}
						hinduism = {
							set_province_flag = hinduism_province
						}
						sikhism = {
							set_province_flag = sikhism_province
						}
						jain = {
							set_province_flag = jain_province
						}
						adi_dharam = {
							set_province_flag = adi_dharam_province
						}
						confucianism = {
							set_province_flag = confucianism_province
						}
						buddhism = {
							set_province_flag = buddhism_province
						}
						shinto = {
							set_province_flag = shinto_province
						}
						mahayana = {
							set_province_flag = mahayana_province
						}
						vajrayana = {
							set_province_flag = vajrayana_province
						}
						animism = {
							set_province_flag = animism_province
						}
						tengri_pagan_reformed = {
							set_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_province
						}
						shamanism = {
							set_province_flag = shamanism_province
						}
						polynesian_religion = {
							set_province_flag = polynesian_religion_province
						}
						west_african_pagan_reformed = {
							set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_province
						}
						baltic_pagan_reformed = {
							set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_province
						}
						norse_pagan_reformed = {
							set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_province
						}
						slavic_pagan_reformed = {
							set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_province
						}
						finnish_pagan_reformed = {
							set_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_province
						}
						hellenic_pagan = {
							set_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_province
						}
						inti = {
							set_province_flag = inti_province
						}
						nahuatl = {
							set_province_flag = nahuatl_province
						}
						mesoamerican_religion = {
							set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_province
						}
						pantheism = {
							set_province_flag = pantheism_province
						}
						totemism = {
							set_province_flag = totemism_province
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = converted_heretics
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = converted_heathens
						value = 0
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = converts
							value = 1
						}
						owner = {
							ai = no
						}
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = religious_news_major
						}
						NOT = {
							owner = {
								any_owned_province = {
									has_province_flag = expelled_minority
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = converted_province
					owner = {
						country_event = {
							id = dg_conversion.004
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_flag = expelled_minority
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = dg_turmoil.050
						days = 0
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = tc_tolerance_own
					value = modifier:tolerance_own
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = tc_tolerance_heretic
					value = modifier:tolerance_heretic
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = tc_tolerance_heathen
					value = modifier:tolerance_heathen
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						is_city = yes
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = tc_tolerance_own
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = tc_tolerance_heretic
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = tc_tolerance_heathen
						which = PREV
					}
					clr_province_flag = heretic_presence
					remove_province_modifier = heretic_minority_2
					remove_province_modifier = heretic_minority_4
					remove_province_modifier = heretic_minority_6
					remove_province_modifier = heretic_minority_8
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = heretics
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = heretics
									value = 6
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = heretics
										value = 8
									}
								}
								add_province_modifier = {
									name = heretic_minority_8
									duration = -1
								}
							}
							else = {
								add_province_modifier = {
									name = heretic_minority_6
									duration = -1
								}
							}
						}
						else = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = heretics
										value = 4
									}
								}
								add_province_modifier = {
									name = heretic_minority_4
									duration = -1
								}
							}
							else = {
								add_province_modifier = {
									name = heretic_minority_2
									duration = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = catholic_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = catholic_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = catholic_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = catholic_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = catholic_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = catholic
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											has_country_flag = useful_catholic
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = christians_permitted
												NOT = {
													has_country_flag = chinese_rites_banned
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = catholic
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										NOT = {
											OR = {
												religion = catholic
												has_country_flag = chinese_rites_banned
											}
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = christian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = catholic
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = catholic
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = catholic_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = catholic_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = catholic_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = catholic_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = catholic_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = catholic_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {

												name = catholic_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}

										else = {

												name = catholic_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_tolerated_MAP

													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}

												name = catholic_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1

										}
										else = {
