												name = catholic_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = catholic_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = orthodox_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = orthodox_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = orthodox_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = orthodox_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = orthodox_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = orthodox
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = orthodox
											has_country_flag = useful_orthodox
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = orthodox
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = orthodox
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											any_owned_province = {
												OR = {
													has_province_modifier = orthodox_patriarchate
													has_province_modifier = orthodox_patriarchate_captive
												}
											}
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = christian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {

										value = 6

					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_4_persecuted

					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = coptic_minority_4_accepted

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = coptic
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_4_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = coptic_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_oppressed_MAP
										}

								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = coptic_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = coptic_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = chaldean_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = chaldean_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = chaldean_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = chaldean_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = chaldean_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = chaldean
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = chaldean
											has_country_flag = useful_chaldean
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = chaldean
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = chaldean
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											any_owned_province = {
												OR = {
													has_province_modifier = chaldean_patriarchate
													has_province_modifier = chaldean_patriarchate_captive
												}
											}
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = chaldean
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = christian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = chaldean
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = chaldean
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = chaldean_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = chaldean_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_tolerated_MAP

									}

											limit = {

													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = chaldean_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_persecuted_MAP
										}

													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = chaldean_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = chaldean_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = chaldean_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = chaldean_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = chaldean_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = protestant_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = protestant_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = protestant_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = protestant_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = protestant_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = protestant
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = protestant
											has_country_flag = useful_protestant
											has_country_modifier = protestant_sympathies
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = protestant
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = protestant
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											OR = {
												AND = {
													religion = reformed
													has_country_flag = evangelical_union
												}
												has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
											}
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = protestant
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = christian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = protestant
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = protestant
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = protestant
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}

												duration = -1

													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold

												name = protestant_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1

											set_province_flag = protestant_persecuted_MAP
										}

												duration = -1
											}

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = protestant_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = protestant_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = reformed_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = reformed_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = reformed_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = reformed_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = reformed_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = reformed
											has_country_flag = useful_reformed
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = reformed
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = reformed
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											OR = {
												AND = {
													religion = protestant
													has_country_flag = evangelical_union
												}
												has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
											}
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = christian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = reformed
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = reformed
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = reformed_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = reformed_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}

												name = reformed_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}

												name = reformed_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}

												duration = -1

										}
										else = {

												name = reformed_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}

											limit = {

												name = reformed_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}

												name = reformed_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hussite_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = hussite_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hussite_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hussite_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hussite_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = hussite
								value = 2
							}
						}

							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = hussite
											has_country_flag = useful_hussite
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}

								NOT = {

								}

								value = 0
							}

								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = hussite
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
										}
									}

										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}

								limit = {

										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}

								}

									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}

								limit = {
									owner = {

									}
								}
								set_variable = {

									which = tc_tolerance_heretic

							}

							}

										value = 6
									}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hussite_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hussite_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hussite_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hussite_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hussite_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold

												name = hussite_minority_6_persecuted

												duration = -1

												duration = -1

												duration = -1

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hussite_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = gnostic_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = gnostic_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = gnostic_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = gnostic_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = gnostic_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = gnostic
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = gnostic
											has_country_flag = useful_gnostic
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = gnostic
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = gnostic
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = christians_permitted
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = gnostic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = christian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {

										value = 6

									limit = {

							set_variable = {

								value = 0
							}

					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = jewish_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = jewish_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = jewish_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = jewish_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = jewish_oppressed_MAP

							check_variable = {

								value = 2

									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}

									owner = {
										religion_group = jewish_group
									}
								}

									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance

							}

												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = jewish
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_4_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_accepted_MAP
										}

												name = jewish_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jewish_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jewish_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = sunni_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = sunni_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = sunni_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = sunni_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = sunni_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = sunni
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = sunni
											has_country_flag = useful_sunni
											has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									OR = {
										has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
										AND = {
											has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam_included
											religion = zoroastrian
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = sunni
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = sunni
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											religion = wahhabi
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 3
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = sunni
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = muslim
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = sunni
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = sunni
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sunni_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sunni_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sunni_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sunni_tolerated_MAP
										}

									else = {

												name = sunni_minority_8_persecuted

											}

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}

										if = {

												name = sunni_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}

												duration = -1

											limit = {

												}

												name = sunni_minority_2_persecuted

										}
										else = {

												name = sunni_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sunni_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shiite_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = shiite_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shiite_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shiite_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shiite_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = shiite
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = shiite
											has_country_flag = useful_shiite
											has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = shiite
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = shiite
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											religion = sunni
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 3
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											OR = {
												has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
												AND = {
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam_included
													religion = zoroastrian
												}
											}
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}

								limit = {

										value = 1
									}
								}

									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration

								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}

									which = toleration
								}

									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own

							}

									which = tc_tolerance_heathen

												name = shiite_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1

												duration = -1

											set_province_flag = shiite_tolerated_MAP

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = shiite
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {

												name = shiite_minority_4_persecuted

												duration = -1

											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shiite_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shiite_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = ibadi_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = ibadi_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = ibadi_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = ibadi_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = ibadi_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = ibadi
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = ibadi
											has_country_flag = useful_ibadi
											has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = ibadi
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										owner = {
											religion = ibadi
										}
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											religion = sunni
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 3
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											OR = {
												has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
												AND = {
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam_included
													religion = zoroastrian
												}
											}
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = ibadi
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = muslim
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = ibadi
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = ibadi
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = ibadi_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = ibadi_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = ibadi_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = ibadi_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {

											limit = {

													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = ibadi_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = ibadi_persecuted_MAP
										}

												name = ibadi_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}

									}

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {

											limit = {

													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance

											}

									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = ibadi_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = ibadi_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = ibadi_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = ibadi_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = ibadi_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = ibadi_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = ibadi_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = ibadi_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = wahhabi_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = wahhabi_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = wahhabi_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = wahhabi_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = wahhabi_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = wahhabi
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											AND = {
												OR = {
													culture_group = arabian
													culture_group = mashreqi
												}
											}
											has_country_flag = useful_wahhabi
											has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = wahhabi
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = wahhabi
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											OR = {
												culture_group = arabian
												culture_group = mashreqi
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = wahhabi
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}

										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = wahhabi_minority_6_persecuted

											}

												duration = -1
											}

									limit = {

											value = 4
										}

									if = {

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
