										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = wahhabi_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = wahhabi_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = druze_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = druze_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = druze_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = druze_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = druze_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = druze
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = druze
											has_country_flag = useful_druze
											has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
											has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = druze
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = druze
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = muslims_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = druze
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = muslim
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = druze
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {

													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold

												name = druze_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}

												duration = -1

												duration = -1

										}
									}

												duration = -1
											}

									}

								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hinduism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = hinduism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hinduism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hinduism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hinduism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = hinduism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = hinduism
											has_country_flag = useful_hinduism
											has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
											has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}

						}

							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = hinduism
								}

									}

									value = 0

								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = jain
									}
								}

									value = 3
								}
							}

									value = 1
								}
							}

								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}

								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0

									which = tc_tolerance_own

							}

									}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hinduism_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hinduism_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hinduism_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												name = hinduism_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1

											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hinduism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hinduism_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_tolerated_MAP
										}

													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold

												name = hinduism_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hinduism_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hinduism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = jain_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = jain_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = jain_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = jain_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = jain_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = jain
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = jain
											has_country_flag = useful_jain
											has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
											has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = jain
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = jain
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = hinduism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = jain
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = dharmic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = jain
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {

											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = jain_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jain_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												name = jain_minority_8_tolerated

												duration = -1
											}

										else = {

											}
											set_province_flag = jain_tolerated_MAP
										}

												name = jain_minority_2_persecuted

											}
											set_province_flag = jain_persecuted_MAP
										}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = jain_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = sikhism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = sikhism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = sikhism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = sikhism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = sikhism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = sikhism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = sikhism
											has_country_flag = useful_sikhism
											AND = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
													has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
												}
												religion_years = {
													sikhism = 60
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = sikhism
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = sikhism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
									}
									religion_years = {
										sikhism = 60
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
									}
									religion_years = {
										sikhism = 60
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {

										value = 1
									}

								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = sikhism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {

									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic

							}
							else = {

							}

											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sikhism_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sikhism_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sikhism_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sikhism_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sikhism_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}

												name = sikhism_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold

										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sikhism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = sikhism_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_tolerated_MAP
										}

									else = {

											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}

												name = sikhism_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												name = sikhism_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = sikhism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = zoroastrian_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = zoroastrian
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = zoroastrian
											has_country_flag = useful_zoroastrian
											has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
											has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = zoroastrian
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = zoroastrian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = persian_group
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = zoroastrian
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = dharmic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = zoroastrian
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = zoroastrian
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = zoroastrian_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = zoroastrian_accepted_MAP

										else = {

												duration = -1

									else = {

											limit = {

													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = zoroastrian_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = zoroastrian_persecuted_MAP

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = zoroastrian_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = zoroastrian_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = zoroastrian_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = zoroastrian_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = zoroastrian_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = zoroastrian_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = zoroastrian_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = zoroastrian_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = zoroastrian_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = confucianism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = confucianism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = confucianism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = confucianism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = confucianism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = confucianism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											religion = confucianism
											has_country_flag = useful_confucianism
											has_country_modifier = confucianism_dominates
											has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
											has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = confucianism
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = confucianism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_modifier = confucianism_dominates
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = confucianism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = taoic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {

									check_variable = {

										value = 6

											value = 8
										}

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = confucianism_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = confucianism_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = confucianism_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_persecuted_MAP
										}

												name = confucianism_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}

										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {

													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {

											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = confucianism_minority_6_persecuted

												name = confucianism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_accepted_MAP
										}

												name = confucianism_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_tolerated_MAP

													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold

											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												name = confucianism_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = confucianism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = buddhism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = buddhism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = buddhism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = buddhism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = buddhism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = buddhism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = buddhism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_buddhism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_modifier = buddhism_dominates
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = buddhism
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = buddhism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_modifier = buddhism_dominates
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = buddhism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = taoic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = buddhism
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = buddhism
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold

												name = buddhism_minority_8_accepted

									}

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = buddhism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = buddhism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												name = buddhism_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = buddhism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = buddhism_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = buddhism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												name = buddhism_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = buddhism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = vajrayana_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = vajrayana_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = vajrayana_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = vajrayana_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = vajrayana_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = vajrayana
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = vajrayana
									}

									NOT = {

									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {

									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
									}

								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}

							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = vajrayana
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = vajrayana
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_modifier = buddhism_dominates
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}

								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}

									owner = {
										religion = vajrayana

								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = taoic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = vajrayana
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = vajrayana
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = vajrayana_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_accepted_MAP

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}

										}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_oppressed_MAP

												check_variable = {

													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}

											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1

											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = vajrayana_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = vajrayana_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = mahayana_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = mahayana_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = mahayana_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = mahayana_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = mahayana_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = mahayana
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = mahayana
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_mahayana
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_modifier = buddhism_dominates
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = mahayana
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = mahayana
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_modifier = buddhism_dominates
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = mahayana
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = taoic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = mahayana
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = mahayana
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = mahayana_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												name = mahayana_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = mahayana
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}

											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_4_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mahayana_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mahayana_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = animism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = animism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = animism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = animism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = animism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = animism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = animism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_animism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = animism
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = animism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = animism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = animism
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = animism
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = animism
											value = 4
										}

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_tolerated_MAP

										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}

												name = animism_minority_4_persecuted

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = animism_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = animism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = west_african_pagan_reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_west_african_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											OR = {
												culture_group = mande_group
												culture_group = senegambian
												culture_group = songhai_group
												culture_group = dogon_group
												culture_group = senufo_group
												culture_group = akan_group
												culture_group = kru_group
												culture_group = volta_group
												culture_group = saharan_group
												culture_group = plateau_group
												culture_group = chadic_group
												culture_group = kwa_group
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
