									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = west_african_pagan_reformed
										value = 6

								}
								if = {
									limit = {

											which = west_african_pagan_reformed
											value = 8

									if = {

												duration = -1
											}

										else = {

												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1

									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold

												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted

											}

										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}

									else = {

											limit = {

													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}

							}

								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = west_african_pagan_reformed
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = west_african_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = west_african_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shinto_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = shinto_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shinto_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shinto_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shinto_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = shinto
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = shinto
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_shinto
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = shinto
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = shinto
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											owner = {
												has_country_modifier = shinto_buddhism
											}
											owner = {
												has_country_modifier = yuiitso_shinto
											}
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										owner = {
											AND = {
												culture_group = japanese
											}
										}
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 2
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = shinto
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = shinto
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = shinto
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = shinto
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_4_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shinto_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shinto_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = adi_dharam_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = adi_dharam_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = adi_dharam_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = adi_dharam_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = adi_dharam_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = adi_dharam
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = adi_dharam
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_adi_dharam
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = adi_dharam
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = adi_dharam
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											OR = {
												culture_group = eastern_aryan
												culture_group = hindusthani
												culture_group = central_indian
												culture_group = pahari_group
												culture_group = deccan_group
												culture_group = rajput
												culture_group = dravidian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}

									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration

							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = adi_dharam
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = adi_dharam
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {

								}

										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = adi_dharam_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = adi_dharam_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = adi_dharam_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = adi_dharam_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = adi_dharam_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = adi_dharam_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = adi_dharam_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = adi_dharam_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = polynesian_religion_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = polynesian_religion_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = polynesian_religion_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = polynesian_religion_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = polynesian_religion_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = polynesian_religion
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = polynesian_religion
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_polynesian_religion
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = polynesian_religion
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = polynesian_religion
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = malay
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = polynesian_religion
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance

					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed

					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP

						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = tengri_pagan_reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_tengri_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = altaic
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}

								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}

									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included

											}
										}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = tengri_pagan_reformed
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold

												name = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = shamanism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = shamanism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shamanism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shamanism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = shamanism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = shamanism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = shamanism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_shamanism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = shamanism
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = shamanism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											AND = {
												culture_group = korean_group
											}
											primary_culture = tibetan
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = shamanism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = shamanism
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = shamanism
											value = 8
										}

										limit = {
											check_variable = {

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {

												name = shamanism_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}

												duration = -1

												name = shamanism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shamanism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {

											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = shamanism_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shamanism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = shamanism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}

								value = 0

								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = inti_minority_8_accepted

					clr_province_flag = inti_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = inti_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = inti_oppressed_MAP

						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = inti
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}

									NOT = {

									}

									}

									NOT = {

									NOT = {

									}
								}

								}

									value = 0

									}
								}

									value = 3

									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}

								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
											AND = {

											}
										}
									}
								}

									which = toleration
									value = 1

								value = 3

								value = 0

												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = inti_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = inti_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = inti_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = inti_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = inti_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = inti_persecuted_MAP
										}

												duration = -1

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold

												duration = -1

												name = inti_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = inti_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = nahuatl_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = nahuatl_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = nahuatl_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = nahuatl_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = nahuatl_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = nahuatl
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = nahuatl
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_nahuatl
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = nahuatl
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = nahuatl
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = aztecan_group
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = nahuatl
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = new_world_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = nahuatl
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = nahuatl
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {

												duration = -1
											}

										}
										else = {

												duration = -1
											}

										}
									}

								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}

												name = nahuatl_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = nahuatl_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = nahuatl_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = nahuatl_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = nahuatl_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = nahuatl_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = nahuatl_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = nahuatl_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = mesoamerican_religion
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = mesoamerican_religion
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_mesoamerican_religion
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = mesoamerican_religion
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = mesoamerican_religion
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = mayan_group
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
											AND = {

											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = mesoamerican_religion
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = new_world_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = mesoamerican_religion
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = mesoamerican_religion
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}

							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = mesoamerican_religion
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}

												duration = -1
											}

										}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_tolerated_MAP
										}

									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = mesoamerican_religion_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = mesoamerican_religion_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = pantheism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = pantheism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = pantheism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = pantheism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = pantheism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = pantheism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = pantheism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_pantheism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = pantheism
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = pantheism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = andean_american
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = pantheism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = new_world_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = pantheism
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = pantheism
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_persecuted_MAP

												name = pantheism_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_accepted_MAP

										else = {

												name = pantheism_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
