												name = pantheism_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = pantheism
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_4_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = pantheism_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = pantheism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = totemism_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = totemism_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = totemism_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = totemism_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = totemism_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = totemism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = totemism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_totemism
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = totemism
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = totemism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											OR = {
												culture_group = athabascan_group
												culture_group = salishan
												culture_group = penutian
												culture_group = uto_aztecan
												culture_group = caddoan
												culture_group = plain_algonquian
												culture_group = muskogean
												culture_group = timicuan
												culture_group = calusan
												culture_group = eastern_siouan
												culture_group = iroquian
												culture_group = east_algonquian
												culture_group = west_algonquian
												culture_group = north_algonquian
												culture_group = plain_indians
												culture_group = tonkawan
												culture_group = atakapan
												culture_group = chetimachan
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = totemism
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = new_world_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = totemism
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = totemism
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_8_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = totemism
											value = 4
										}

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}

										if = {

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_persecuted_MAP
										}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = totemism_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = totemism_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = hellenic_pagan_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = hellenic_pagan
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = hellenic_pagan
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_hellenic_pagan
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = hellenic_pagan
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = hellenic_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											OR = {
												primary_culture = greek
												primary_culture = pontic
												primary_culture = cappadocian
												primary_culture = gothic
												primary_culture = greek_colonial
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy_included
												}
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}

									check_variable = {

									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold

									which = toleration

									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}

								limit = {
									owner = {

									}
								}

									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own

									}

												name = hellenic_pagan_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = hellenic_pagan_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = slavic_pagan_reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_slavic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										culture_group = east_slavic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy_included
												}
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = european_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = slavic_pagan_reformed
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = slavic_pagan_reformed
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}

											check_variable = {

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}

												check_variable = {

												duration = -1
											}

											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}

								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = slavic_pagan_reformed
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}

											limit = {
												check_variable = {

												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}

								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = slavic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = baltic_pagan_reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_baltic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										culture_group = east_slavic
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy_included
												}
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1

									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration

								subtract_variable = {

									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
									}
								}

									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = european_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {

									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen

							if = {

									check_variable = {

										value = 6

												duration = -1

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold

											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = baltic_pagan_reformed
											value = 4
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = baltic_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = norse_pagan_reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = norse_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_norse_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = norse_pagan_reformed
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = norse_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = scandinavian
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy_included
												}
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = norse_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = european_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heretic
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_heathen
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = norse_pagan_reformed
										value = 6
									}
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = norse_pagan_reformed
											value = 8
										}
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {

											limit = {

											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP

									}

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {

												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance

												duration = -1
											}

									limit = {

											which = norse_pagan_reformed
											value = 4

									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}

										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold

												duration = -1
											}

												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
												which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
													which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
										}
										else = {
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
												duration = -1
											}
											set_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = toleration
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_2_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_4_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_6_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_8_oppressed
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_2_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_4_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_6_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_8_persecuted
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_2_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_4_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_6_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_8_tolerated
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_2_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_4_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_6_accepted
					remove_province_modifier = finnish_pagan_reformed_minority_8_accepted
					clr_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_accepted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_tolerated_MAP
					clr_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_persecuted_MAP
					clr_province_flag = finnish_pagan_reformed_oppressed_MAP
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = finnish_pagan_reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = useful_finnish_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
									}
								}
								owner = {
									NOT = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = heretic_presence
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										AND = {
											culture_group = finnic
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = syncretism
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 3
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 2
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										OR = {
											has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted
											AND = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_included
													has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy_included
												}
												religion = zoroastrian
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = toleration
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
								value = 3
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
								value = -4
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = toleration
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_accepted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_tolerated_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = tv_dg_persecuted_threshold
									which = toleration
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tv_owner_religion_tolerance
									which = tc_tolerance_own
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									owner = {
										religion_group = european_pagan
									}
								}
								set_variable = {

										if = {
											limit = {
												owner = {
													NOT = {
														check_variable = {
															which = monastic_decline
															value = 2
														}
													}
												}
												OR = {
													has_province_modifier = catholic_pilgrimage
													NOT = {
														AND = {
															base_production = 5
														}
													}
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = cistercian_order
												duration = 10000
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								piety = -0.60
								PAP = {
									check_variable = {
										which = papal_authority
										value = 400
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = catholic_pragmatic_sanction
							}
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = national_church
							}
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = patronato_real
							}
							NOT = {
								government = theocracy
							}
						}
						every_owned_province = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								continent = europe
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = greedy_bishop
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = absentee_bishop
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = effective_bishop
								}
							}
							random = {
								chance = 1
								random_list = {
									25 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = {
													AND = {
														PAP = {
															has_country_flag = simony_abolished
														}
														PAP = {
															has_country_flag = annate_abolished
														}
													}
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = greedy_bishop
												duration = 2000
											}
											owner = {
												set_country_flag = simony
											}
											PAP = {
												add_treasury = 5
											}
											set_province_flag = simony_province
											every_neighbor_province = {
												limit = {
													culture = PREV
													has_owner_culture = yes
													owner = {
														religion = catholic
														NOT = {
															num_of_cities = 10
														}
														ai = yes
													}
												}
												owner = {
													set_country_flag = simony
												}
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													is_year = 1375
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														NOT = {
															owner = {
																adm_tech = 2
															}
														}
													}
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = {
																NOT = {
																	is_religion_enabled = protestant
																}
															}
															PAP = {
																change_variable = {
																	which = reform_desire_simony
																	value = 0.03
																}
															}
														}
													}
													owner = {
														add_reform_desire = 0.0003
													}
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														owner = {
															adm_tech = 2
														}
													}
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = {
																NOT = {
																	is_religion_enabled = protestant
																}
															}
															PAP = {
																change_variable = {
																	which = reform_desire_simony
																	value = 0.1
																}
															}
														}
													}
													owner = {
														add_reform_desire = 0.001
													}
												}
												hidden_effect = {
													if = {
														limit = {
															has_global_flag = renaissance
															NOT = {
																owner = {
																	has_country_flag = reaction_to_reformation
																}
															}
														}
														owner = {
															change_variable = {
																which = catholic_corruption
																value = 1
															}
														}
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
									25 = {
										hidden_effect = {
											clr_province_flag = absentee_bishop
										}
										add_province_modifier = {
											name = effective_bishop
											duration = 4000
										}
										remove_province_modifier = religious_scandal_province
									}
									25 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = {
													AND = {
														base_production = 5
													}
												}
												PAP = {
													NOT = {
														AND = {
															has_country_flag = clerical_residence
															has_country_flag = seminaries
														}
													}
												}
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													is_year = 1375
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														NOT = {
															owner = {
																adm_tech = 2
															}
														}
													}
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = {
																NOT = {
																	is_religion_enabled = protestant
																}
															}
															PAP = {
																change_variable = {
																	which = reform_desire_absenteeism
																	value = 0.03
																}
															}
														}
													}
													owner = {
														add_reform_desire = 0.0003
													}
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														owner = {
															adm_tech = 2
														}
													}
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = {
																NOT = {
																	is_religion_enabled = protestant
																}
															}
															PAP = {
																change_variable = {
																	which = reform_desire_absenteeism
																	value = 0.1
																}
															}
														}
													}
													owner = {
														add_reform_desire = 0.001
													}
												}
												hidden_effect = {
													if = {
														limit = {
															has_global_flag = renaissance
															NOT = {
																owner = {
																	has_country_flag = reaction_to_reformation
																}
															}
														}
														owner = {
															change_variable = {
																which = catholic_corruption
																value = 1
															}
														}
													}
												}
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													owner = {
														piety = 0.60
													}
												}
												add_province_modifier = {
													name = absentee_bishop
													duration = 8000
												}
											}
											else_if = {
												limit = {
													owner = {
														piety = 0.20
													}
												}
												add_province_modifier = {
													name = absentee_bishop
													duration = 4000
												}
											}
											else_if = {
												limit = {
													owner = {
														piety = -0.20
													}
												}
												add_province_modifier = {
													name = absentee_bishop
													duration = 2000
												}
											}
											else = {
												add_province_modifier = {
													name = absentee_bishop
													duration = 1000
												}
											}
											hidden_effect = {
												set_province_flag = absentee_bishop
												owner = {
													set_country_flag = absenteeism
												}
												every_neighbor_province = {
													limit = {
														culture = PREV
														has_owner_culture = yes
														owner = {
															religion = catholic
															NOT = {
																num_of_cities = 10
															}
															ai = yes
														}
													}
													owner = {
														set_country_flag = absenteeism
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
									25 = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												PAP = {
													has_country_flag = indulgences_permitted
												}
												PAP = {
													NOT = {
														has_country_flag = indulgences_banned
													}
												}
											}
											PAP = {
												change_variable = {
													which = indulgences_sold
													value = 1
												}
											}
											set_province_flag = indulgence_peddler
											if = {
												limit = {
													is_year = 1375
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														NOT = {
															owner = {
																adm_tech = 2
															}
														}
													}
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = {
																NOT = {
																	is_religion_enabled = protestant
																}
															}
															PAP = {
																change_variable = {
																	which = reform_desire_indulgences
																	value = 0.05
																}
															}
														}
													}
													owner = {
														add_reform_desire = 0.0005
													}
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														owner = {
															adm_tech = 2
														}
													}
													hidden_effect = {
														if = {
															limit = {
																NOT = {
																	is_religion_enabled = protestant
																}
															}
															PAP = {
																change_variable = {
																	which = reform_desire_indulgences
																	value = 0.15
																}
															}
														}
													}
													owner = {
														add_reform_desire = 0.0015
													}
												}
												hidden_effect = {
													if = {
														limit = {
															has_global_flag = renaissance
															NOT = {
																owner = {
																	has_country_flag = reaction_to_reformation
																}
															}
														}
														owner = {
															change_variable = {
																which = catholic_corruption
																value = 1
															}
														}
													}
												}
											}
											add_province_modifier = {
												name = indulgence_peddler
												duration = 400
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.001.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = {
						which = religious_prestige
						value = 0.5
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = dg_conversion.002
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.002
	title = dg_conversion.002.t
	desc = dg_conversion.002.d
	picture = world_religions
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.002.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = religious_prestige
					value = 5.000
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = religious_prestige
						value = 7.500
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = religious_prestige
							value = 9.000
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 9.500
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = religious_prestige
									value = 10.000
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = 6.000
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 5.700
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 5.400
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 8.000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = religious_prestige
									value = 8.500
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = 5.100
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 4.800
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 4.500
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = religious_prestige
							value = 6.000
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 6.500
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = religious_prestige
									value = 7.000
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = 4.200
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 3.900
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 3.600
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 5.500
							}
						}
						add_legitimacy = 3.300
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 3.000
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = religious_prestige
						value = 2.500
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = religious_prestige
							value = 3.500
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 4.000
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = religious_prestige
									value = 4.500
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = 2.700
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 2.400
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 2.100
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 3.000
							}
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1.800
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 1.500
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = religious_prestige
							value = 1.000
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 1.500
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = religious_prestige
									value = 2.000
								}
							}
							add_legitimacy = 1.200
						}
						else = {
							add_legitimacy = 0.900
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_legitimacy = 0.600
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = religious_prestige
								value = 0.500
							}
						}
						add_legitimacy = 0.300
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence
					value = 10
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence
						value = 15
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = papal_influence
							value = 18
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 19
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = papal_influence
									value = 20
								}
							}
							add_papal_influence = 100
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 95
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 90
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 16
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = papal_influence
									value = 17
								}
							}
							add_papal_influence = 85
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 80
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 75
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = papal_influence
							value = 12
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 13
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = papal_influence
									value = 14
								}
							}
							add_papal_influence = 70
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 65
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 60
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 11
							}
						}
						add_papal_influence = 55
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence
						value = 5
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = papal_influence
							value = 7
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 8
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = papal_influence
									value = 9
								}
							}
							add_papal_influence = 45
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 40
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 35
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 6
							}
						}
						add_papal_influence = 30
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 25
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = papal_influence
							value = 2
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 3
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = papal_influence
									value = 4
								}
							}
							add_papal_influence = 20
						}
						else = {
							add_papal_influence = 15
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = papal_influence
								value = 1
							}
						}
						add_papal_influence = 5
					}
					else = {
						add_papal_influence = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = religious_prestige
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = papal_influence
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.003
	title = dg_conversion.003.t
	desc = dg_conversion.003.d
	picture = world_religions
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = religious_news_choice_explained
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
			}
			custom_tooltip = church_property_changed_explained
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					religion = protestant
				}
				NOT = {
					religion = reformed
				}
				NOT = {
					religion = hussite
				}
				NOT = {
					religion = gnostic
				}
			}
			remove_country_modifier = married_pastors_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = celibate_priests_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = limited_divorce_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = civil_unions_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = biblical_inerrancy_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = individual_interpretation_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = guided_interpretation_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = adult_baptism_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = predestination_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = elected_ministers_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = lay_priesthood_aspect
			remove_country_modifier = free_membership_aspect
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

					NOT = {
						tag = ROOT
					}
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = religious_news_major

								tag = ROOT
								OR = {

					}
				}
				else_if = {

					}
					add_opinion = {

						modifier = new_religion_observant
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.60
					}
					add_opinion = {

					}
				}
				else = {

						who = ROOT
						modifier = new_religion_secular
					}
				}

				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = receiving_good_news_by_event
					}
					clr_country_flag = receiving_good_news_by_event
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = was_adi_dharam
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = adi_dharam
					NOT = {
						religion = PREV
					}
					ai = no
					any_known_country = {
						tag = ROOT
					}
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = religious_news_major
							any_known_country = {
								tag = ROOT
								OR = {
									marriage_with = ROOT
									is_neighbor_of = ROOT
									is_rival = ROOT
									is_enemy = ROOT
									vassal_of = ROOT
									overlord_of = ROOT
									war_with = ROOT
									truce_with = ROOT
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.005
					days = 0
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = adi_dharam
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
					}
					NOT = {
						is_colonial_nation_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.60
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.20
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_pious
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.20
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_observant
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.60
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_decadent
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_secular
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
					}
					clr_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
