						has_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
					}
					NOT = {
						is_colonial_nation_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.60
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.20
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_pious
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.20
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_observant
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.60
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_decadent
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_secular
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
					}
					clr_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = was_hellenic_pagan
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = hellenic_pagan
					NOT = {
						religion = PREV
					}
					ai = no
					any_known_country = {
						tag = ROOT
					}
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = religious_news_major
							any_known_country = {
								tag = ROOT
								OR = {
									marriage_with = ROOT
									is_neighbor_of = ROOT
									is_rival = ROOT
									is_enemy = ROOT
									vassal_of = ROOT
									overlord_of = ROOT
									war_with = ROOT
									truce_with = ROOT
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
				}
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.005
					days = 0
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = hellenic_pagan
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
					}
					NOT = {
						is_colonial_nation_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.60
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = 0.20
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_pious
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.20
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_observant
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety = -0.60
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_decadent
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_secular
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
					}
					clr_country_flag = receiving_news_by_event
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						ai = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = dg_conversion.103
				days = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
				}
			}
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = ROOT
					OR = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
						}
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_pious
						}
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_observant
						}
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_decadent
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_pious
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_observant
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = changed_religion_decadent
						}
					}
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_pious
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_observant
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_decadent
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_pious
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_observant
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = changed_religion_decadent
				}
			}
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent
						}
					}
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent
				}
				remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.103
	title = dg_conversion.003.t
	desc = dg_conversion.003.d
	picture = world_religions
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
			}
			OR = {
				ai = no
				government = monarchy
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				OR = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
					}
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_pious
					}
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_observant
					}
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_decadent
					}
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
					}
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_pious
					}
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_observant
					}
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = changed_religion_decadent
					}
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = changed_religion_pious
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = changed_religion_observant
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = changed_religion_decadent
			}

				who = ROOT

			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = changed_religion_pious
			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = changed_religion_observant
			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = changed_religion_decadent
			}
		}
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {

				who = ROOT

			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT

			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction
			}

				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction
			}
		}

			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				set_country_flag = religious_news_major
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_all
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
			}
		}
	}

					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent
					}
				}
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent
			}
			remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction
			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_fanatical
			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_pious
			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_observant
			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_reaction_decadent
			}
			reverse_remove_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = excommunication_counter_reaction
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_all
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_major
				clr_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.f
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				government = theocracy
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.003.g
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = changed_state_religion
			check_variable = {
				which = church_property
				value = 3
			}
			patriarch_authority = 0.10
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				check_variable = {
					which = church_property
					value = 11
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = {
					which = church_property
					value = 7
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = church_property
						value = 5
					}
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 0.5
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 1
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 1.5
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				years_of_income = 2
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -10
			add_devotion = -20
			add_republican_tradition = -5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -8
			add_devotion = -16
			add_republican_tradition = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -6
			add_devotion = -12
			add_republican_tradition = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -4
			add_devotion = -8
			add_republican_tradition = -2
		}
		else = {
			add_legitimacy = -2
			add_devotion = -4
			add_republican_tradition = -1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 1.00
			}
			add_years_of_income = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.90
			}
			add_years_of_income = 3.6
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.80
			}
			add_years_of_income = 3.2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.70
			}
			add_years_of_income = 2.8
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.60
			}
			add_years_of_income = 2.4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.50
			}
			add_years_of_income = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.40
			}
			add_years_of_income = 1.6
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.30
			}
			add_years_of_income = 1.2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.20
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.8
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				patriarch_authority = 0.10
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.4
		}
		add_patriarch_authority = -0.10
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = church_property
				value = -2
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.004
	title = dg_conversion.004.t
	desc = dg_conversion.004.d
	picture = religion_decline
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.004.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 0.5
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 0.3
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 1
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 0.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 1.5
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 0.9
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 2
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 2.5
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 3
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 4
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 4
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.4
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 5
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 6
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 3.0
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 6
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 7
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 3.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 7
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 8
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4.2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 8
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 9
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4.8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 9
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = conversion_prestige
						value = 10
					}
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 5.6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = conversion_prestige
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_legitimacy = 6
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 1
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 2
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 3
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 4
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 15
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 4
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 5
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 6
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 25
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 6
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 8
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 30
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 8
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 10
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 40
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 10
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 12
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 12
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 14
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 14
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 16
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 70
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 16
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 18
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 80
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 18
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = papal_influence_conversion
						value = 20
					}
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 90
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				check_variable = {
					which = papal_influence_conversion
					value = 20
				}
			}
			add_papal_influence = 100
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = conversion_prestige
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = papal_influence_conversion
				value = 0
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				has_province_flag = converted_province
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = recently_converted
				duration = 90
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_province_flag = converted_province
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.005
	title = dg_conversion.005.t
	desc = dg_conversion.005.d
	picture = world_religions
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.005.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = FROM
				modifier = changed_religion_fanatical
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = FROM
				modifier = changed_religion_pious
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = FROM
				modifier = changed_religion_observant
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = FROM
				modifier = changed_religion_decadent
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_opinion = {
				who = FROM
				modifier = changed_religion_secular
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = dg_conversion.008.d

		name = dg_conversion.008.a
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = crusade_sponsor
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_catholic_crusade
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.009
	title = dg_conversion.009.t
	desc = dg_conversion.009.d
	picture = ai_only
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = missionary_targets
			value = 0
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_missionaries = 1
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = missionary_targets
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_missionaries = 2
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = missionary_targets
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_missionaries = 3
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = missionary_targets
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_missionaries = 4
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = missionary_targets
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_missionaries = 5
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = missionary_targets
				value = 1
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				has_missionary = yes
			}
			set_province_flag = missionary_target
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_province_modifier = conversion_system_province
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = conversion_system_province
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

				}

					which = missionary_chance
					which = jewish
				}
			}

					which = ibadi

			if = {

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					religion = chaldean
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = missionary_chance
					which = chaldean
				}
			}
			if = {

							which = jewish_population

				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_finnish_pagan_reformed
					NOT = {
						religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = finnish_pagan_reformed
							value = 2
						}
						controlled_by = owner
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = missionary_target_chance
						which = finnish_pagan_reformed
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = missionary_chance
						which = finnish_pagan_reformed
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner = {
								finnish_pagan_reformed = 1
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = missionary_chance
							value = 0.7
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner = {
								finnish_pagan_reformed = 3
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = missionary_chance
							value = 0.7
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = missionary_policy_baltic_pagan_reformed
					NOT = {
						religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
					}

			every_owned_province = {
				multiply_variable = {
					which = missionary_chance
					value = 1.4
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = missionary_target_chance
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_owner_religion = yes
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = missionary_target_chance
						value = 0.5
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_capital = yes
					}
					multiply_variable = {

						value = 2
					}

				if = {
					limit = {

							is_core = owner

						value = 0.5

						value = 0.5

					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = missionary_target_chance
						value = 0.5
					}
				}

			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = {
							which = missionary_targets
							value = 1
						}
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = missionary_target_chance
						value = 0.1
					}
					NOT = {
						has_province_flag = missionary_target
					}
					all_province = {
						OR = {
							NOT = {
								check_variable = {
									which = missionary_target_chance
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = missionary_target_chance
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = missionary_target
				owner = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missionary_targets
						value = -1
					}
				}
			}

						set_province_flag = missionary_success
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = missionary_chance
						value = 10
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = 1
					random = {
						chance = 50
						set_province_flag = missionary_success
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = missionary_success
				}
				set_province_flag = religious_change
				change_variable = {
					which = missionary_system_success
					value = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = missionary_success
					has_missionary = yes
				}
				clr_province_flag = missionary_success

province_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.011
	title = dg_conversion.011.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = pagan
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = european_pagan
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = pagan
			}
			NOT = {
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = true_faith
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 166
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				has_owner_culture = yes
				has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
				AND = {
					owner = {
						total_development = 1200
					}
					culture_group = owner
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				stability = 2
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				advisor = inquisitor
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				any_neighbor_province = {
					religion_group = pagan
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				any_neighbor_province = {
					religion_group = european_pagan
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = pagan
			}
			NOT = {
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = christian
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = christian
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = converted_heathens
				value = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = added_unrest
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				province_event = {
					id = stacking_unrest.002
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.012
	title = dg_conversion.012.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	trigger = {
		religion_group = muslim
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = muslim
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim
			}
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = true_faith
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 333
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				has_owner_culture = yes
				has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
				AND = {
					owner = {
						total_development = 1200
					}
					culture_group = owner
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			AND = {
				culture_group = turko_byzantine
				owner = {
					culture_group = turko_byzantine
				}
			}
			factor = 0.35
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				stability = 2
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				advisor = inquisitor
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				any_neighbor_province = {
					religion_group = muslim
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = christian
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = christian
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = converted_heathens
				value = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = added_unrest
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				province_event = {
					id = stacking_unrest.002
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.013
	title = dg_conversion.013.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	trigger = {
		religion_group = christian
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = christian
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = christian
			}
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = true_faith
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 333
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}

			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}

			factor = 0.7

		modifier = {

			factor = 1.4
		}

				has_owner_culture = yes
				has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
				AND = {
					owner = {

				}

			factor = 0.7

			}
			factor = 0.7

				advisor = inquisitor
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				any_neighbor_province = {
					religion_group = christian
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = christian
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {

				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = muslim

					owner = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = converted_heathens
				value = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = added_unrest
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				province_event = {
					id = stacking_unrest.002
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}

	id = dg_conversion.014
	title = dg_conversion.014.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	trigger = {
		religion_group = dharmic
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = dharmic
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = dharmic
			}
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = true_faith
		}
	}

		years = 333

						value = 0.03

				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan

					owner = {

				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}

			change_variable = {
				which = converted_heathens
				value = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = added_unrest
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				province_event = {
					id = stacking_unrest.002
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.015
	title = dg_conversion.015.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	trigger = {
		religion_group = taoic
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = taoic
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = taoic
			}
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = true_faith
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 333
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.08
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.09
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.11
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.12
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_building = temple_heathen
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_core = owner
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				has_owner_culture = yes
				has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
				AND = {
					owner = {
						total_development = 1200
					}
					culture_group = owner
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				stability = 2
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				advisor = inquisitor
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = -1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			tolerance_to_this = 1
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			is_overseas = yes
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				any_neighbor_province = {
					religion_group = taoic
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = taoic
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = christian
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = christian
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = dharmic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = taoic
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = jewish_group
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = european_pagan
					}
				}
				AND = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
					owner = {
						religion_group = new_world_pagan
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = converted_heathens
				value = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.011.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = added_unrest
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				province_event = {
					id = stacking_unrest.002
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
	}
}

	id = dg_conversion.016

	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline

		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_owner_religion = no
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = jewish_group
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = jewish_group
			}
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = true_faith
		}

province_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.017
	title = dg_conversion.011.t
	desc = dg_conversion.011.d
	picture = religion_decline
	trigger = {
		religion_group = new_world_pagan
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_province = {
				owner = {
					religion_group = new_world_pagan
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = new_world_pagan
			}
			stability = 0
			prestige = 0
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = true_faith
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 83
		modifier = {
			owner = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_modifier_value = {
						which = global_missionary_strength
						value = 0.03
					}
				}
			}
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {

				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.04
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}

			owner = {
				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.05
				}
			}

		}

				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.06
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}

				has_global_modifier_value = {
					which = global_missionary_strength
					value = 0.07
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7

			}

					value = 0.09
				}
			}

country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.018
	title = dg_conversion.018.t
	desc = dg_conversion.018.d
	picture = all_mischief
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.018.a
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_province_modifier = syncretism
				}
				has_missionary = no
				OR = {
					check_variable = {
						which = nahuatl
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = mesoamerican_religion
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = inti
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = totemism
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = pantheism
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = animism
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = west_african_pagan_reformed
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = tengri_pagan_reformed
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = shamanism
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = norse_pagan_reformed
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = slavic_pagan_reformed
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = finnish_pagan_reformed
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = baltic_pagan_reformed
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = polynesian_religion
						value = 4
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = hellenic_pagan
						value = 4
					}
					AND = {
						check_variable = {
							which = shinto
							value = 4
						}
						NOT = {
							owner = {
								religion = mahayana
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						check_variable = {
							which = adi_dharam
							value = 4
						}
						NOT = {
							owner = {
								religion = hinduism
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							owner = {
								religion = jain
							}
						}
					}
				}
				is_city = yes
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = syncretism
				duration = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				multiply_variable = {
					which = nahuatl
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = nahuatl
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = inti
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = inti
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mesoamerican_religion
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = mesoamerican_religion
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = pantheism
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = pantheism
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = totemism
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = totemism
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = tengri_pagan_reformed
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = tengri_pagan_reformed
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = shamanism
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = shamanism
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = animism
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = animism
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = polynesian_religion
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = polynesian_religion
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = west_african_pagan_reformed
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = west_african_pagan_reformed
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = hellenic_pagan
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = hellenic_pagan
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = baltic_pagan_reformed
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = baltic_pagan_reformed
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = slavic_pagan_reformed
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = slavic_pagan_reformed
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = finnish_pagan_reformed
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = finnish_pagan_reformed
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = norse_pagan_reformed
					value = 0.5
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converts
					which = norse_pagan_reformed
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							owner = {
								religion = mahayana
							}
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = shinto
						value = 0.5
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = converts
						which = shinto
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							owner = {
								OR = {
									religion = hinduism
									religion = jain
								}
							}
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = adi_dharam
						value = 0.5
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = converts
						which = adi_dharam
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.010
	title = dg_conversion.010.t
	desc = dg_conversion.010.d
	picture = world_religions
	trigger = {
		AND = {
			is_subject = yes
			NOT = {
				is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
			}
			NOT = {
				is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			religious_unity = 0.75
		}
		any_known_country = {
			overlord_of = ROOT
			NOT = {
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				war_exhaustion = 5
			}
			NOT = {
				senior_union_with = ROOT
			}
		}

			NOT = {

		years = 10
		modifier = {
			religion_group = christian
			is_religion_enabled = protestant
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = counter_reformation

			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = catholic_reformation

		}

				}

			factor = 2
		}

			}

					religion = nahuatl
				}
			}
			change_religion = nahuatl
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = mesoamerican_religion
				}
			}
			change_religion = mesoamerican_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = inti
				}
			}
			change_religion = inti
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = pantheism
				}
			}
			change_religion = pantheism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = totemism
				}
			}
			change_religion = totemism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = polynesian_religion
				}
			}
			change_religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = animism
				}
			}
			change_religion = animism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = shamanism
				}
			}
			change_religion = shamanism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = polynesian_religion
				}
			}
			change_religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = hellenic_pagan
				}
			}
			change_religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			change_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = norse_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			change_religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			change_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			change_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			change_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.010.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_adm_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = {
				liberty_desire = 80
			}
			custom_tooltip = stability_points_gained_50
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = {
					which = stability_points
					value = 50
				}
				country_event = {
					id = POP_Stability.002
				}
			}
			overlord = {
				ROOT = {
					declare_war_with_cb = {
						who = PREV
						casus_belli = cb_religious_independence
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_liberty_desire = 20
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				overlord_of = ROOT
			}
			every_province = {
				limit = {
					owned_by = ROOT
					religion = PREV
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = fanatics_organizing
					duration = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.019
	title = dg_turmoil.019.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.019.d
	picture = all_reply_insult
	trigger = {
		is_colonial_nation = yes
		any_country = {
			overlord_of = ROOT
			NOT = {
				religion = ROOT
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			overlord_of = ROOT
			check_variable = {
				which = sympathy_to_old_religion
				value = 1
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = oath_of_tolerance
		}
		is_at_war = no
		OR = {
			AND = {
				religion = catholic
				any_country = {
					overlord_of = ROOT
					has_country_flag = was_catholic
				}
			}

country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.020
	title = dg_conversion.020.t
	desc = dg_conversion.020.d
	picture = all_mission
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.020.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_neighbor_country = {
					NOT = {
						religion = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						is_rival = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
						}
					}
					any_owned_province = {
						any_neighbor_province = {
							owned_by = ROOT
						}
						NOT = {
							religion = ROOT
						}
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					OR = {
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 200
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.40
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 400
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.60
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 600
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.80
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 800
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 1.00
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 1000
								}
							}
						}
					}
					army_size = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				NOT = {
					religion = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					is_rival = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
					}
				}
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						religion = ROOT
					}
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						capital_distance = {
							who = ROOT
							distance = 200
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 0.40

						}

						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
						}
					}

							religion = ROOT

			}
			random_neighbor_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						religion = ROOT
					}
					is_rival = ROOT
					NOT = {
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
						}
					}
					any_owned_province = {
						any_neighbor_province = {
							owned_by = ROOT
						}
						NOT = {
							religion = ROOT
						}
					}
					OR = {
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 200
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.40
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 400
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.60
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 600
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.80
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 800
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 1.00
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 1000
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = {
							owned_by = ROOT
						}
						NOT = {
							religion = ROOT
						}
					}
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = heretic_missionary
						duration = 2000
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_province_flag = gnostic_missionary_active
						set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
					}
					province_event = {
						id = dg_turmoil.077
						days = 200
					}
				}
			}
		}

							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 1.00
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 1000
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}

					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = {
							owned_by = ROOT

						NOT = {

								patriarch_authority = 0.40
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 400
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.60
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 600
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.80
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 800
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 1.00
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 1000
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = {
							owned_by = ROOT
						}
						NOT = {
							religion = ROOT
						}
					}
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = heretic_missionary
						duration = 2000
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_province_flag = sunni_missionary_active
						set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
					}
					province_event = {
						id = dg_turmoil.077
						days = 200
					}
				}
			}
		}

					limit = {
						any_neighbor_province = {
							owned_by = ROOT

					}
					is_rival = ROOT
					OR = {
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 200
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.40
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 400
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.60
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 600
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 0.80
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 800
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								patriarch_authority = 1.00
							}
							NOT = {
								capital_distance = {
									who = ROOT
									distance = 1000
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				religion = ROOT
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						religion = ROOT
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						capital_distance = {
							who = ROOT
							distance = 200
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 0.40
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 400
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 0.60
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 600
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 0.80
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 800
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 1.00
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 1000
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_treasury = -10
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						religion = ROOT
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						capital_distance = {
							who = ROOT
							distance = 200
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 0.40
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 400
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 0.60
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 600
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 0.80
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 800
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = {
							patriarch_authority = 1.00
						}
						NOT = {
							capital_distance = {
								who = ROOT
								distance = 1000
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						religion = ROOT
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = foreign_missionary
					duration = 2000
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.020.f
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
			}
			add_adm_power = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = strong_missionary_tradition
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = no_missionary_tradition
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = 10
		}
		remove_country_modifier = foreign_missionaries
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.021
	title = dg_conversion.021.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_catholic
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = catholic
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}
			}
			OR = {
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 2
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 4
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 6
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 8
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		years = 41

	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.021.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = refused_catholic_conversion
			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_catholic
		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = catholic
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = catholic
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = catholic
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = catholic
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = catholic
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = catholic
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = catholic
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = catholic
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.022
	title = dg_conversion.022.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_orthodox
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = orthodox
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}
			}
			OR = {
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 2
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 4
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 6
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 8
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 41
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_permitted
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = christians_tolerated
			OR = {
				religion = confucianism
				religion_group = pagan
				religion_group = european_pagan
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = refused_orthodox_conversion
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = {
					which = orthodox
					value = 4
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			capital_scope = {
				check_variable = {
					which = orthodox
					value = 8
				}
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				religious_unity = 1.00
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				religious_unity = 0.80
			}
			factor = 0.7

			factor = 0.7

			factor = 0.7
		}

			NOT = {

			}
			factor = 0.7
		}

		add_dip_power = 100
		add_mil_power = 50

		}
		capital_scope = {
			hidden_effect = {

					which = added_unrest

						id = stacking_unrest.002
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_5
			change_religion = orthodox
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					religion = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = converted_heathens
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				has_owner_culture = yes
				is_overseas = no
				has_owner_religion = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = orthodox_10
			hidden_effect = {
				change_variable = {
					which = converted_heathens
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		change_religion = orthodox
		swap_free_idea_group = yes

			ai = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = dg_conversion.021.e_2
		add_adm_power = -20
		set_country_flag = eternal_refusal_orthodox
		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = orthodox
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = orthodox
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = orthodox
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = orthodox
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = orthodox
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = orthodox
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = orthodox
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = orthodox
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = orthodox
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = orthodox
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
