		if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 6
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = protestant
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = protestant
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = protestant
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = protestant
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = protestant
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = protestant
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = protestant
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = protestant
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = protestant
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = protestant
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.024
	title = dg_conversion.024.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_reformed
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = reformed
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}
			}
			OR = {
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT
				vassal_of = ROOT
				overlord_of = ROOT
				alliance_with = ROOT
				marriage_with = ROOT

					tech_difference = 4
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 2
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 4
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 12
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 6
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 16
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 8
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tech_difference = 20
					NOT = {
						num_of_cities = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 41

					value = 1

		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = reformed
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = reformed
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = reformed
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = reformed
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = reformed
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = reformed
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = reformed
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = reformed
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = reformed
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = dg_conversion.025
	title = dg_conversion.025.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}

			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_coptic
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = coptic
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}

				truce_with = ROOT

					who = ROOT

		else_if = {
			limit = {
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = coptic
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = coptic
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = coptic
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = coptic
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = coptic
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = coptic
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = coptic
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = coptic
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = coptic
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = coptic
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = coptic
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = dg_conversion.026
	title = dg_conversion.026.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_gnostic
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = gnostic
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT

				}

				culture_group = ROOT

					tech_difference = 8
					NOT = {

					}

					}

					}
				}

		}
	}

				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = gnostic
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = gnostic
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = gnostic
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = gnostic
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = gnostic
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = gnostic
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = gnostic
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = gnostic
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = gnostic
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = gnostic
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = gnostic
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}

	id = dg_conversion.027
	title = dg_conversion.027.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_hussite
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = hussite
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {

					who = ROOT

			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = hussite
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = hussite
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = hussite
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = hussite
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = hussite
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = hussite
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = hussite
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = hussite
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = hussite
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = hussite
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = hussite
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}

	id = dg_conversion.028
	title = dg_conversion.028.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_sunni
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = sunni
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}

				truce_with = ROOT
			}

					who = ROOT

			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = sunni
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = sunni
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = sunni
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = sunni
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = sunni
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = sunni
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = sunni
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = sunni
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = sunni
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = sunni
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = sunni
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.029
	title = dg_conversion.029.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_shiite
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = shiite
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}
			}

				culture_group = ROOT

					}

					}

		}
	}

				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = shiite
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = shiite
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = shiite
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = shiite
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = shiite
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = shiite
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = shiite
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = shiite
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = shiite
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = shiite
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = shiite
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.030
	title = dg_conversion.030.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_ibadi
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = ibadi
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}

					NOT = {

					}

					}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = ibadi
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = ibadi
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = ibadi
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = ibadi
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = ibadi
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = ibadi
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = ibadi
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = ibadi
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = ibadi
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ibadi
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.031
	title = dg_conversion.031.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_wahhabi
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = wahhabi
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}
			}
			OR = {
				culture_group = ROOT
				senior_union_with = ROOT

					}
				}

					NOT = {

					}
				}

						num_of_cities = 6
					}
				}

					NOT = {

					}
				}
				AND = {

						num_of_cities = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		years = 41

							check_variable = {
								which = wahhabi
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = wahhabi
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = wahhabi
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = wahhabi
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = wahhabi
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = wahhabi
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = wahhabi
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = wahhabi
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = wahhabi
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = wahhabi
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = wahhabi
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.032
	title = dg_conversion.032.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_hinduism
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = hinduism
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {

					who = ROOT

						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = hinduism
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = hinduism
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = hinduism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = hinduism
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = hinduism
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = hinduism
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = hinduism
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = hinduism
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = hinduism
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = hinduism
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = hinduism
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.033
	title = dg_conversion.033.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_sikhism
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = sikhism
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}

					}

					}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = sikhism
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = sikhism
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = sikhism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = sikhism
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = sikhism
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = sikhism
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = sikhism
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = sikhism
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = sikhism
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = sikhism
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = sikhism
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}

		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_jain
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = jain

				war_with = ROOT

				truce_with = ROOT

					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = jain
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = jain
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = jain
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = jain
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = jain
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = jain
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = jain
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = jain
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = jain
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = jain
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.035
	title = dg_conversion.035.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_zoroastrian
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = zoroastrian
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}
			}

				culture_group = ROOT

					NOT = {

					}

					}
				}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

							check_variable = {
								which = zoroastrian
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = zoroastrian
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = zoroastrian
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = zoroastrian
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = zoroastrian
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = zoroastrian
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = zoroastrian
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.036
	title = dg_conversion.036.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_buddhism
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = buddhism
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}
			}

					}

					}
				}

		}
	}

					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = buddhism
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = buddhism
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = buddhism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = buddhism
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = buddhism
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = buddhism
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = buddhism
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = buddhism
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = buddhism
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = buddhism
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = buddhism
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.037
	title = dg_conversion.037.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_mahayana
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = mahayana
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}

				culture_group = ROOT

					}

					}
				}

		}
	}

					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = mahayana
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = mahayana
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = mahayana
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = mahayana
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = mahayana
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mahayana
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = mahayana
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = mahayana
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = mahayana
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = mahayana
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = mahayana
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = dg_conversion.038
	title = dg_conversion.038.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_vajrayana
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = vajrayana
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {

					who = ROOT

				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = vajrayana
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = vajrayana
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = vajrayana
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = vajrayana
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = vajrayana
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = vajrayana
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = vajrayana
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = vajrayana
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = vajrayana
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = vajrayana
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = vajrayana
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.039
	title = dg_conversion.039.t
	desc = dg_conversion.021.d
	picture = all_missionaries
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = pagan
			religion_group = european_pagan
			religion_group = new_world_pagan
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = eternal_refusal_confucianism
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = confucianism
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_opinion_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = refused_conversion
				}

					}

					}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			}

				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = confucianism
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = confucianism
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = confucianism
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = confucianism
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = confucianism
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = confucianism
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = confucianism
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = confucianism
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = confucianism
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = confucianism
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = confucianism
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}

		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_cities = 30
			}
			custom_tooltip = foreign_religion_unrest_4
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							check_variable = {
								which = jewish
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = jewish
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = jewish
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 2
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_province = {
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							religion = jewish
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_variable = {
								which = added_unrest
								value = 4
							}
							hidden_effect = {
								province_event = {
									id = stacking_unrest.002
								}
							}
						}
						custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						check_variable = {
							which = jewish
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							religion = jewish
						}
						check_variable = {
							which = jewish
							value = 2
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 2
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						religion = jewish
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = jewish
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = added_unrest
							value = 4
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							province_event = {
								id = stacking_unrest.002
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = added_unrest_4
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = jewish
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = refused_conversion
					}
				}
				OR = {
					culture_group = ROOT
					senior_union_with = ROOT
					vassal_of = ROOT
					overlord_of = ROOT
					alliance_with = ROOT
					marriage_with = ROOT
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 4
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 8
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 12
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 16
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tech_difference = 20
						NOT = {
							num_of_cities = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_conversion
			}
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.041
	title = dg_conversion.041.t
	desc = dg_conversion.041.d
	picture = reformed_confession
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.020.h
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			any_rival_country = {
				OR = {
					religion = catholic
					religion = protestant
				}
				is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
					}
				}
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
						is_in_capital_area = yes
					}
					OR = {
						religion = catholic
						religion = protestant
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_rival_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = catholic
					religion = protestant
				}
				is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
					}
				}
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
						is_in_capital_area = yes
					}
					OR = {
						religion = catholic
						religion = protestant
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
						is_in_capital_area = yes
					}
					OR = {
						religion = catholic
						religion = protestant
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = heretic_missionary
					duration = 2000
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_province_flag = reformed_missionary_active
					set_province_flag = foreign_missionary
				}
				province_event = {
					id = dg_turmoil.077
					days = 200
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.020.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		trigger = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				OR = {
					religion = catholic
					religion = protestant
				}
				is_rival = ROOT
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
					}
				}
				any_owned_province = {
					any_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
						is_in_capital_area = yes
					}
					OR = {
						religion = catholic
						religion = protestant
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					religion = catholic
					religion = protestant
				}
				is_rival = ROOT
				NOT = {

						has_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
					}
				}
				any_owned_province = {

						owned_by = ROOT
						is_in_capital_area = yes
					}
					OR = {
						religion = catholic

						owned_by = ROOT

					OR = {

country_event = {
	id = dg_conversion.050
	title = dg_conversion.050.t
	desc = dg_conversion.050.d
	picture = world_religions
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = dg_conversion.003
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.050.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				FROM = {
					religious_unity = 1
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				FROM = {
					religious_unity = 0.80
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				FROM = {
					religious_unity = 0.60
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			change_religion = ROOT
			add_liberty_desire = 20
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_conversion.050.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		FROM = {
			add_liberty_desire = -10
		}
	}
}
